mapper.select: select * from liepin.work_log,liepin.work_log_detail where liepin.work_log.user_id = #{loginId} and liepin.work_log_detail.id = liepin.work_log.id and liepin.work_log.create_time like CONCAT(#{createTime},'%')

select * from liepin.work_log,liepin.work_log_problem,liepin.work_log_detail where liepin.work_log.user_id = #{loginId} and liepin.work_log_problem.id = liepin.work_log.id and liepin.work_log_detail.id = liepin.work_log.id and liepin.work_log_problem.dlt = 'NO'

select work_log_detail.id,work_log_detail.intentional_customer,work_log.user_id,work_log_detail.phone_num, work_log_detail.wechat_num,work_log_detail.work_plan,work_log_detail.work_situation,work_log_detail.work_summary from work_log_detail , work_log where work_log_detail.id = work_log.id and liepin.work_log.user_id = #{loginId} and work_log.create_time like CONCAT(#{dayTime},'%')

select work_log_problem.id,work_log_problem.problem_info,work_log_problem.solved, work_log_problem.solution,work_log_problem.contact,work_log_problem.dlt from work_log_problem,work_log where work_log_problem.id = work_log.id and work_log.user_id = #{loginId} and work_log.create_time like CONCAT(#{dayTime},'%') and work_log_problem.dlt = 'NO'

select work_log_problem.id,work_log_problem.problem_info,work_log_problem.solved, work_log_problem.solution,work_log_problem.contact,work_log_problem.dlt from work_log_problem,work_log where work_log_problem.id = work_log.id and work_log.id = #{logId} and work_log_problem.dlt = 'NO'

select work_log_detail.id,work_log_detail.intentional_customer,work_log.user_id,work_log_detail.phone_num, work_log_detail.wechat_num,work_log_detail.work_plan,work_log_detail.work_situation,work_log_detail.work_summary from work_log_detail , work_log where work_log_detail.id = work_log.id and liepin.work_log.id = #{logId}
